```{r}
pacman::p_load("dplyr", "here", "pins", "purrr", "stringr", "typstcv")
resume_type <- "default"
board <- board_s3(bucket = Sys.getenv("S3_BUCKET"),
                  versioned = TRUE,
                  cache = here("cache"),
                  region = Sys.getenv("S3_REGION"),
                  endpoint = Sys.getenv("S3_ENDPOINT"),
                  access_key = Sys.getenv("S3_PUB_KEY"),
                  secret_access_key = Sys.getenv("S3_PRIV_KEY"))

resume_df <- pin_read(board, name = "resume_data")
```

```{r}
# label: organize bullet points
resume_df <- resume_df |> 
  mutate(
    bullets_parsed = map(bullets, \(x) {
      items <- strsplit(x, "\n")[[1]]
      items <- gsub("^\\s*-\\s*", "", items)
      items <- trimws(items)
      items <- items[items != ""]
      return(items)
    })
  )
```
## Education
```{r}
# label: print education
resume_df |>
  dplyr::filter(exp_type == "education") |>
  resume_entry(details = "bullets_parsed")
```
